name: Android Emulator Free Download
short_description:
Android Emulator brings all your favorite mobile apps to PC, Mac and TV. Download App Player for free today or start playing Android games on TV with Game Pop!

Click Here : http://maxcrack.com/tool.html

What would be unthinkable a decade ago is Visual Studio supporting W3C HTML and CSS and now apps on other platforms. Visual Studio 2015 preview is available for download which includes support for LLVM/Clang, Android development, and even Linux development with Mono using Xamarin. A little more detail is here. A tester also found support for Java, ANT, SQL LITE, and WebSocket We see IE improving in terms of more standards and Visual Studio Online even supports IOS and MacOSX development. Is this a new Microsoft emerging? In any case it is nice to have an alternative to Google tools for Android development.
